	\makecell{\textbf{Standard Normal} \\ $N(0,1)$} & -- & $\frac{1}{\sqrt{2\pi}} e^{-\frac{x^2}{2}}$ & x = 0,1,... &  & 0 & 1 &  \\

	\hline
	\makecell{\textbf{Weibull} \\ $Wei(\lambda,k)$} & \makecell{$\lambda \in (0,+\infty)$ \\ $k \in (0,+\infty)$} & $\begin{cases} \frac{k}{\lambda}(\frac{x}{\lambda}) e^{-(\frac{x}{\lambda})^k}) , & x heq 0 \\ 0 , & x<0 \end{cases}$ & $x \in [0,\infty]$ & $\begin{cases} 1-e^{-(\frac{x}{\lambda})} , & x heq 0 \\ 0 , & x<0 \end{cases}$ & $\lambda$ Î“$(1 + \frac{1}{k})$ &  &  \\
